name: Block Buster
overview: Block Buster is a breakout-style game that can be played by one player through a series of levels, or by two players in cooperative or VS modes. This game shares the same engine as the Japanese game Block Kuzushi 2 (also released as Simple 1500 Series Vol. 45: The Block Kuzushi 2), but contains reworked graphics and a completely different set of levels.
